actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to permit the Governor of Louisiana to set aside up to 10 percent of the payments received by the State government under the State and Local Fiscal Assistance Act of 1972 for use solely for local law enforcement purposes.

summary.text: Permits the Governor of Louisiana to set aside up to 10 percent of the payments received by the State government under the State and Local Fiscal Assistance Act of 1972 for use solely for local law enforcement purposes.

titles.title: A bill to permit the Governor of Louisiana to set aside up to 10 percent of the payments received by the State government under the State and Local Fiscal Assistance Act of 1972 for use solely for local law enforcement purposes.
